subject: DRV - Direct Radio Voice recordings
author: Misty
full_text:
I did a DRV session last night and I just wanted to share some of the 
results with the group. They came thru quite clearly even tho they had 
some difficulty making the link to where I was tuned off station in 
the "dead" zone. I usually start and end my sweep sessions off station 
but they had been coming thru quite clear there so last night I did the 
entire session that way. As always Tony was there to lend a hand.

http://www.esnips.com/web/directradiovoice

For those who have any difficulty playing the files try downloading 
then playing.

Misty
